content.text: Pretty good actually! I just got a new job as a florist.
That's so cool! I love flowers. I have a dog that loves flowers too.
That's so sweet! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy. He's the best!
Oh my gosh I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly and lovable.
They are! He's always excited to see me, and he loves to play fetch.
That sounds like a great dog!
He is. He's my best friend.
I'm glad you have such a great companion.
I hope you two have many more years of happiness together.
Thank you! I hope so too.
